Title: extractGroups
Description: Match all groups of given input string with a given regular expression, returns an array of arrays of matches.

haystack — Input string. String.pattern — Regular expression with re2 regular expression syntax. Must contain groups, each group enclosed in parentheses. If pattern contains no groups, an exception is thrown. String.
Array of arrays of matches. Array.
Examples: SELECT extractGroups('hello abc=111 world', '("[^"]+"|\\w+)=("[^"]+"|\\w+)') AS result;
